abstract: Ryad Boudebouz (Arabic: رياض بودبوز‎) (born 19 February 1990) is an Algerian football player who is currently playing for SC Bastia in Ligue 1 and the Algeria national team. He plays as an attacking midfielder, primarily on the right wing.A former French youth international, Boudebouz switched allegiances to Algeria in 2010 and played for the team at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
